overview:
Steve portrays the essence of a modern renaissance man. A serial entrepreneur, Internationally ranked Sailor, Aviator, car collector/racer, accomplished marksman, Soldier, Technologist, outdoors man, well educated, and a world traveler. His view of Zfere is as broad as the diversity of his interests.

He has more than 20 years of entrepreneurial experience and has successfully served in many capacities, including Chief Executive Officer, of several successful ventures. Steve currently sits on the board of directors of three organizations and has successfully negotiated multiple-billion dollar contracts. He possesses a visionary mind and an eclectic personality, this coupled with his focused and dedicated demeanor makes him a valuable resource for Zfere.
